description:
RiC-O (Records in Contexts-Ontology) is an OWL ontology for describing archival record resources. As the second part of Records in Contexts standard, it is a formal representation of Records in Contexts Conceptual Model (RiC-CM).

- Homepage: <https://www.ica.org/standards/RiC/RiC-O_v0-2.html#>
- Version: 0.2

AccumulationRelation.label: Accumulation Relation
AccumulationRelation.description: Connects at least one Record Resource or Instantiation to at            least one Agent, when the Agent accumulates it, be it intentionally (collecting it) or            not (receiving it in the course of its activities).

Activity.label: Activity
Activity.description: The doing of something for some human purpose.

ActivityDocumentationRelation.label: Activity Documentation Relation
ActivityDocumentationRelation.description: Connects at least one Record Resource or Instantiation to at            least one Activity, when the Record Resource or Instantiation results from the            activity.

Agent.label: Agent
Agent.description: A Person, or Group, or an entity created by a Person or Group            (Mechanism), or a Position, that acts in the world.

AgentControlRelation.label: Agent Control Relation
AgentControlRelation.description: Connects at least one Agent, to at least another Agent, when the            first one(s) control(s) in a way the activities of the second one(s).

AgentHierarchicalRelation.label: Agent Hierarchical Relation
AgentHierarchicalRelation.description: Connects at least one Agent to at least another Agent, when the            first one is hierarchically superior to the second one.

AgentName.label: Agent Name
AgentName.description: A label, title or term designating an Agent in order to make it            distinguishable from other similar entities.

AgentOriginationRelation.label: Agent Origination Relation
AgentOriginationRelation.description: Connects at least one Record Resource or an Instantiation to at            least one Agent that creates or accumulates the Record Resource, receives it, or sends            it.

AgentTemporalRelation.label: Agent Temporal Relation
AgentTemporalRelation.description: Connects at least one Agent, to at least another Agent, that            succeeds it chronologically for, for instance, fullfilling some functions or performing            some activities.

Appellation.label: Appellation
Appellation.description: A concept of any kind that is used for designating an Entity and            referring to it.

AppellationRelation.label: Appellation Relation
AppellationRelation.description: The relation between an Appellation and at least one Thing that            the Appellation designates.

AuthorityRelation.label: Authority Relation
AuthorityRelation.description: Connects at least one Agent, and at least one Thing over which            the Agent has some authority.

AuthorshipRelation.label: Authorship Relation
AuthorshipRelation.description: Connects at least one Record to at least one Person, Group or            Position that is responsible for conceiving and formulating the information contained in            the Record.

CarrierExtent.label: Carrier Extent
CarrierExtent.description: The extent of a Record Resource carrier

CarrierType.label: Carrier Type
CarrierType.description: Categorization of physical material in or on which information            is represented.

ChildRelation.label: Child Relation
ChildRelation.description: Connects at lest one Person, to at least another Person, when            the first has child the second one.

Concept.label: Concept
Concept.description: An idea, unit of thought, abstract cultural object or            category

ContentType.label: Content Type
ContentType.description: The fundamental form of communication in which a Record is            expressed and the human sense through which it is intended to be            perceived.

Coordinates.label: Coordinates
Coordinates.description: Longitudinal and latitudinal information of a            Place.

CorporateBody.label: Corporate Body
CorporateBody.description: An organized group of persons that act together as an Agent, and            that has a recognized legal or social status.

CorrespondenceRelation.label: Correspondence Relation
CorrespondenceRelation.description: Connects at least two Persons, when they correspond to each            other.

CreationRelation.label: Creation Relation
CreationRelation.description: Connects at least one Record Resource or Instantiation to at            least one Agent, when the Agent is either responsible for all or some of the content of            the Record Resource, or is a contributor to the genesis or production of the            Instantiation.

Date.label: Date
Date.description: Chronological information associated with an entity that            contributes to its identification and contextualization.

DateRange.label: Date Range
DateRange.description: Chronological information associated with an entity that            contributes to its identification and contextualization, that implies or explicitly            states a start date and end date.

DateSet.label: Date Set
DateSet.description: Non-contiguous single dates or date ranges.

DemographicGroup.label: Demographic Group
DemographicGroup.description: Categorization of a person according to characteristics such as            age, gender, education, place of origin, ethnic/cultural identification, religion,            etc.

DerivationRelation.label: Derivation Relation
DerivationRelation.description: Connects an Instantiation to at least one Instantiation that is            derived from it.

DescendanceRelation.label: Descendance Relation
DescendanceRelation.description: Connects at least one Person to at least another Person, when            the first has/have descendant the second one(s).

DocumentaryFormType.label: Documentary Form Type
DocumentaryFormType.description: Categorization of the document with respect to its extrinsic and            intrinsic elements that together communicate its content, administrative and documentary            context, and authority

Event.label: Event
Event.description: Something that happens in time and space.

EventRelation.label: Event Relation
EventRelation.description: Connects at least one Event to at least one Thing, when the            first is associated with the existence and lifecycle of the second one.

Extent.label: Extent
Extent.description: Countable characteristics of the content of an entity expressed            as a quantity.

ExtentType.label: Extent Type
ExtentType.description: Categorization of the extent that is being measured

Family.label: Family
Family.description: Two or more persons related by birth, or through marriage,            adoption, civil union, or other social conventions that bind them together as a socially            recognized familial group.

FamilyRelation.label: Family Relation
FamilyRelation.description: Connects at least two Persons, when they have some family link,            i.e. belong to the same family.

FunctionalEquivalenceRelation.label: Functional Equivalence Relation
FunctionalEquivalenceRelation.description: Connects at least two Instantiations which may be considered as            equivalent.

Group.label: Group
Group.description: Two or more Agents that act together as an Agent.

GroupSubdivisionRelation.label: Group Subdivision Relation
GroupSubdivisionRelation.description: Connects a Group and at least another Group, when the first one            as the second one(s) among its subdivisions.

Identifier.label: Identifier
Identifier.description: A word, number, letter, symbol, or any combination of these used            to uniquely identify or reference an individual instance of an entity within a specific            information domain.

Instantiation.label: Instantiation
Instantiation.description: The inscription of information made by an Agent on a physical            carrier in any persistent, recoverable form as a means of communicating information            through time and space.

IntellectualPropertyRightsRelation.label: Intellectual Property Rights Relation
IntellectualPropertyRightsRelation.description: Connects at least one Agent and one Record Resource or            Instantiation on which the Agent has some intellectual property rights.

KnowingOfRelation.label: Knowing Of Relation
KnowingOfRelation.description: Connects at least one Person to at least another one, when the            first one has some knowledge of the second one through time or space.

KnowingRelation.label: Knowing Relation
KnowingRelation.description: Connects at least two Persons that directly know each other            during their existence. This relation is symmetric.

Language.label: Language
Language.description: A spoken or written human language represented in the Record or            Record Part, or used by the Agent.

LeadershipRelation.label: Leadership Relation
LeadershipRelation.description: Connects at least one Person and at least one Group, when the            first one leads the second one.

ManagementRelation.label: Management Relation
ManagementRelation.description: Connects at least one Agent, and at least one Record Resource or            Instantiation that the Agent manages.

Mandate.label: Mandate
Mandate.description: Delegation of authority by an Agent to another Agent to perform            an Activity.

MandateRelation.label: Mandate Relation
MandateRelation.description: Connects at least one Mandate, and at least one Agent, when the            first gives the second one the authority or competencies to act. May also involve one to            many Activities that the Mandate(s) assign(s) to the Agent(s).

Mechanism.label: Mechanism
Mechanism.description: A process or system created by a Person or Group that performs            an Activity.

MembershipRelation.label: Membership Relation
MembershipRelation.description: Connects a Group and at least one Person, when the first one has            the second one(s) among its members.

MigrationRelation.label: Migration Relation
MigrationRelation.description: Connects an Instantiation and at least another Instantiation,            when the first is migrated into the second one(s).

Name.label: Name
Name.description: A label, title or term designating the entity in order to make            it distinguishable from other similar entities.

OccupationType.label: Occupation Type
OccupationType.description: Categorization of a profession, trade, or craft pursued by a            person in fulfilment of an Activity.

OwnershipRelation.label: Ownership Relation
OwnershipRelation.description: Connects at least one Group, Person or Position, and at least a            Thing that these Agent(s) own(s).

PerformanceRelation.label: Performance Relation
PerformanceRelation.description: Connects at least one Activity to at least one Agent, when the            first is performed by the second one(s).

Person.label: Person
Person.description: A human being with a social identity or persona.

PhysicalLocation.label: Physical Location
PhysicalLocation.description: A delimitation of the physical territory of a            Place.

Place.label: Place
Place.description: Bounded, named geographic area or region.

PlaceName.label: Place Name
PlaceName.description: A label, title or term designating a Place in order to make it            distinguishable from other similar entities.

PlaceRelation.label: Place Relation
PlaceRelation.description: Connects a Place and at least one Thing, when the first is            associated with the existence and lifecycle of the second one.

Position.label: Position
Position.description: The functional role of a Person within a Group.

PositionHoldingRelation.label: Position Holding Relation
PositionHoldingRelation.description: Connects at least one Person, and at least one Position that the            Person occupies.

PositionToGroupRelation.label: Position to Group Relation
PositionToGroupRelation.description: Connects at least one Position, and a Group, when the first            one(s) exist(s) in/is defined within the second one.

ProductionTechniqueType.label: Production Technique Type
ProductionTechniqueType.description: Categorization of the method used in the representation of            information on the Instantiation.

ProvenanceRelation.label: Provenance Relation
ProvenanceRelation.description: Specifies the provenance or origin of at least one Record            Resource or Instantiation, for example the relation between a Record Resource and the            Agent which created it or the Activity from which it resulted.

Proxy.label: Proxy
Proxy.description: A Proxy represents (stands for) a Record Resource as it exists            in a specific Record Set.

Record.label: Record
Record.description: Information inscribed at least once by any method on any            physical carrier in any persistent, recoverable form by an Agent in the course of life            or work Activity.

RecordPart.label: Record Part
RecordPart.description: Part of a Record with discrete information content that            contributes to the Record's physical or intellectual completeness.

RecordResource.label: Record Resource
RecordResource.description: A Record, Record Set, or Record Part produced or acquired and            retained by an Agent in the course of Activity.

RecordResourceExtent.label: Record Resource Extent
RecordResourceExtent.description: The extent of the content of a Record Resource.

RecordResourceGeneticRelation.label: Record Resource Genetic Relation
RecordResourceGeneticRelation.description: Connects two to more Record Resources when there is a genetic            relation between them. Genetic in this sense is as defined by diplomatics, i.e. the            process by which a Record Resource is developed.

RecordResourceHoldingRelation.label: Record Resource Holding Relation
RecordResourceHoldingRelation.description: Connects at least one Agent, and one or more Record Resource or            Instantiation that the Agent holds.

RecordResourceToInstantiationRelation.label: Record Resource to Instantiation Relation
RecordResourceToInstantiationRelation.description: Connects a Record Resource to one or more Instantiations that            instantiate it.

RecordResourceToRecordResourceRelation.label: Record Resource to Record Resource Relation
RecordResourceToRecordResourceRelation.description: Connects at least two Record Resources.

RecordSet.label: Record Set
RecordSet.description: One or more records that are associated by categorization and/or            physical aggregation by the creator or other Agent.

RecordSetType.label: Record Set Type
RecordSetType.description: A broad categorization of the type of Record Set.

RecordState.label: Record State
RecordState.description: Categorization of the production or reproduction status of a            Record or Record Part.

Relation.label: Relation
Relation.description: The top level relation class. It connects at least two Things.            An instance of a Relation may have some datatype and object properties : a descriptive            note (datatype property) like any Thing ; certainty (for 'certain', 'quite probable',            'uncertain','unknown'); a date (use either the date datatype property or the Date class            and isAssociatedWithDate object property ; a state (relationState) ; a location (use            Place class and isAssociatedWithPlace object property) ; a source of information that            can be used as an evidence for it (use either source datatype property or hasSource            object property).

RepresentationType.label: Representation Type
RepresentationType.description: Categorization of the method of recording the content type of a            Record Resource.

RiCCMCorrespondingComponent.label: RiC-CM corresponding component
RiCCMCorrespondingComponent.description: When it exists, specifies the identifier and name of RiC-CM            component that corresponds to the annotated class or property.

RoleType.label: Role Type
RoleType.description: The role an agent plays in some context (usually in some            creation relation). Not to be confused with a position (position of an agent in some            group). For example, a person who is the head of some corporate body may play the role            of annotator (of a record) in a creation relation.

Rule.label: Rule
Rule.description: Conditions that govern the existence or authority of an Agent or the performance of an Activity, or that contribute to the distinct characteristics of things created or managed by an Agent.

RuleRelation.label: Rule Relation
RuleRelation.description: Connects at least one Rule to at least one Thing, when it is            associated with existence and lifecycle of the Thing.

SequentialRelation.label: Sequential Relation
SequentialRelation.description: Connects at least one Thing to at least one Thing that follows            it in some sequence.

SiblingRelation.label: Sibling Relation
SiblingRelation.description: Connects at least two Persons, when they are            siblings.

SingleDate.label: Single Date
SingleDate.description: Chronological information associated with an entity that            contributes to its identification and contextualization, related to a single point in            time.

SpouseRelation.label: Spouse Relation
SpouseRelation.description: Connects at least two Persons, when they are            spouses.

TeachingRelation.label: Teaching Relation
TeachingRelation.description: Connects at least one Person to at least another Person, who is            their student.

TemporalRelation.label: Temporal Relation
TemporalRelation.description: Connects at least one Thing to at least one Thing that follows            it in chronological order.

Thing.label: Thing
Thing.description: Any idea, material thing, or event within the realm of human            experience.

Title.label: Title
Title.description: A name that is used for a Record Resource or a            Rule

Type.label: Type
Type.description: A superclass for any category of some thing. A type            characterizes an entity.

TypeRelation.label: Type Relation
TypeRelation.description: Connects a category (a Type) and at least one Thing that belongs            to this category.

UnitOfMeasurement.label: Unit Of Measurement
UnitOfMeasurement.description: A definite magnitude of a quantity, defined and adopted by convention or by            law, that is used as a standard for measurement of the same kind of quantity. Can be            spacial units (cm, m), weigt (g, kg), time (s, h), storage (MB, TB) or more informal            units used in the archival context like number of boxes, pages or words.

WholePartRelation.label: Whole Part Relation
WholePartRelation.description: Connects a Thing to at least one constitutive or component part            of that Thing.

WorkRelation.label: Work Relation
WorkRelation.description: Connects at least two Agents that have some type of work            relation in the course of their activities.

accrual.label: accrual
accrual.description: Information on the anticipated accession(s) to the Record            Set.

accrualStatus.label: accrual status
accrualStatus.description: Information on the status of an Accrual

accumulationRelationHasSource.label: accumulation relation has source
accumulationRelationHasSource.description: Connects an Accumulation Relation to one of the accumulated            Record Resources or Instantiations

accumulationRelationHasTarget.label: accumulation relation has target
accumulationRelationHasTarget.description: Connects an Accumulation Relation to one of the accumulating            Agents

activityDocumentationRelationHasSource.label: activity documentation relation has source
activityDocumentationRelationHasSource.description: Connects an Activity Documentation Relation to one of the            resulting Record Resources or Instantiations

activityDocumentationRelationHasTarget.label: activity documentation relation has target
activityDocumentationRelationHasTarget.description: Connects an Activity Documentation Relation to one of the            documented Activities

activityIsContextOfRelation.label: activity is context of relation
activityIsContextOfRelation.description: Connects an Activity to an Agent Temporal Relation (when the            Activity is transferred from an Agent to another one) or a Mandate Relation (the Mandate            assigns the Activity to the Agent or defines it).

activityIsSourceOfPerformanceRelation.label: activity is source of performance relation
activityIsSourceOfPerformanceRelation.description: Connects an Activity that is performed to a Performance            Relation

activityIsTargetOfActivityDocumentationR.label: activity is target of activity documentation relation
activityIsTargetOfActivityDocumentationR.description: Connects an Activity to an Activity Documentation            Relation

affectsOrAffected.label: affects or affected
affectsOrAffected.description: Connects an Event to a Thing on which the Event has or had some            significant impact.

agentControlRelationHasSource.label: agent control relation has source
agentControlRelationHasSource.description: Connects an Agent Control Relation to one of the controlling            Agents

agentControlRelationHasTarget.label: agent control relation has target
agentControlRelationHasTarget.description: Connects an Agent Control Relation to one of the controlled            Agents

agentHasWorkRelation.label: agent has work relation
agentHasWorkRelation.description: Connects an Agent to a Work Relation

agentHierarchicalRelationHasSource.label: agent hierarchical relation has source
agentHierarchicalRelationHasSource.description: Connects an Agent Hierarchical Relation to one of the            hierarchically superior Agents

agentHierarchicalRelationHasTarget.label: agent hierarchical relation has target
agentHierarchicalRelationHasTarget.description: Connects an Agent Hierarchical Relation to one of the            hierarchically inferior Agents

agentIsConnectedToAgentRelation.label: agent is connected to agent relation
agentIsConnectedToAgentRelation.description: Connects an Agent to an Agent Relation

agentIsSourceOfAgentControlRelation.label: agent is source of agent control relation
agentIsSourceOfAgentControlRelation.description: Connects a controlling Agent to an Agent Control            Relation

agentIsSourceOfAgentHierarchicalRelation.label: agent is source of agent hierarchical relation
agentIsSourceOfAgentHierarchicalRelation.description: Connects a hierarchically superior Agent to an Agent            Hierarchical Relation

agentIsSourceOfAgentTemporalRelation.label: agent is source of agent temporal relation
agentIsSourceOfAgentTemporalRelation.description: Connects a predecessor Agent to an Agent Temporal            Relation

agentIsSourceOfAuthorityRelation.label: agent is source of authority relation
agentIsSourceOfAuthorityRelation.description: Connects an Agent thas has the authority, to an Authority            Relation

agentIsSourceOfIntellectualPropertyRight.label: agent is source of intellectual property rights relation
agentIsSourceOfIntellectualPropertyRight.description: Connects an Agent having the intellectual property rights, to an            Intellectual Property Rights Relation

agentIsSourceOfManagementRelation.label: agent is source of management relation
agentIsSourceOfManagementRelation.description: Connects a manager Agent to a Management Relation

agentIsSourceOfOwnershipRelation.label: agent is source of ownership relation
agentIsSourceOfOwnershipRelation.description: Connects an owner Agent to an Ownership Relation

agentIsSourceOfRecordResourceHoldingRela.label: agent is source of record resource holding relation
agentIsSourceOfRecordResourceHoldingRela.description: Connects an Agent that holds a Record Resource or Instantiation,            to a Record Resource Holding Relation

agentIsTargetOfAccumulationRelation.label: agent is target of accumulation relation
agentIsTargetOfAccumulationRelation.description: Connects one of the accumulating Agents to an Accumulation            Relation

agentIsTargetOfAgentControlRelation.label: agent is target of agent control relation
agentIsTargetOfAgentControlRelation.description: Connects one of the controlled Agents to an Agent Control            Relation

agentIsTargetOfAgentHierarchicalRelation.label: agent is target of agent hierarchical relation
agentIsTargetOfAgentHierarchicalRelation.description: Connects one of the hierarchically inferior Agents to an Agent            Hierarchical Relation

agentIsTargetOfAgentOriginationRelation.label: agent is target of agent origination relation
agentIsTargetOfAgentOriginationRelation.description: Connects one of the Agents that created or accumulated the            Record resource or Instantiation, to an Agent Origination Relation

agentIsTargetOfAgentTemporalRelation.label: agent is target of agent temporal relation
agentIsTargetOfAgentTemporalRelation.description: Connects a successor Agent to an Agent Temporal            Relation

agentIsTargetOfAuthorshipRelation.label: agent is target of authorship relation
agentIsTargetOfAuthorshipRelation.description: Connects a Person, Group or Position to an Authorship            Relation.

agentIsTargetOfCreationRelation.label: agent is target of creation relation
agentIsTargetOfCreationRelation.description: Connects a creator Agent to a Creation Relation

agentIsTargetOfMandateRelation.label: agent is target of mandate relation
agentIsTargetOfMandateRelation.description: Connects a mandated Agent to a Mandate Relation

agentIsTargetOfPerformanceRelation.label: agent is target of performance relation
agentIsTargetOfPerformanceRelation.description: Connects an Agent to a Performance Relation

agentOrActivityIsTargetOfProvenanceRelat.label: agent or activity is target of provenance relation
agentOrActivityIsTargetOfProvenanceRelat.description: Connects an Agent or Activity that is the provenance of a Record            resource or Instantiation, to a Provenance Relation

agentOriginationRelationHasSource.label: agent origination relation has source
agentOriginationRelationHasSource.description: Connects an Agent Origination Relation to one of the resulting            Record Resource or Instantiation

agentOriginationRelationHasTarget.label: agent origination relation has target
agentOriginationRelationHasTarget.description: Connects an Agent Origination Relation to one of the creating or            accumulating Agents

agentRelationConnects.label: agent relation connects
agentRelationConnects.description: Connects an Agent Relation to one of the involved            Agents

agentTemporalRelationHasSource.label: agent temporal relation has source
agentTemporalRelationHasSource.description: Connects an Agent Temporal Relation to one of the predecessor            Agents

agentTemporalRelationHasTarget.label: agent temporal relation has target
agentTemporalRelationHasTarget.description: Connects an Agent Temporal Relation to one of the successor            Agents

altitude.label: altitude
altitude.description: The height of a Place above a reference level, especially above            sea level.

appellationIsSourceOfAppellationRelation.label: appellation is source of appellation relation
appellationIsSourceOfAppellationRelation.description: Connects an Appellation to an Appellation            Relation

appellationRelationHasSource.label: appellation relation has source
appellationRelationHasSource.description: Connects an Appellation Relation to the concerned            Appellation

appellationRelationHasTarget.label: appellation relation has target
appellationRelationHasTarget.description: Connects an Appellation Relation to one of the designated            Things

asConcernsActivity.label: as concerns activity
asConcernsActivity.description: Connects an Agent Temporal Relation or Mandate Relation, to an            Activity that is, either transferred from an Agent to another one, or assigned by a            Mandate to an Agent.

authenticityNote.label: authenticity note
authenticityNote.description: Description of evidences that the Record Resource or            Instantiation is what it purports to be, was created or sent by the said Agent, at the            said time and has not been tampered or corrupted.

authorityRelationHasSource.label: authority relation has source
authorityRelationHasSource.description: Connects an Authority Relation to an Agent that has the            authority

authorityRelationHasTarget.label: authority relation has target
authorityRelationHasTarget.description: Connects an Authority Relation to a Thing over which the            Authority is performed

authorizes.label: authorizes
authorizes.description: Connects a Mandate to the Agent that the Mandate gives the            authority or competencies to act.

authorizingAgent.label: authorizing agent
authorizingAgent.description: Connects a Mandate Relation to an Agent that assigns the            Mandate.

authorizingMandate.label: authorizing mandate
authorizingMandate.description: Information on a Mandate that authorizes an Agent to perform an            Activity.

authorshipRelationHasSource.label: authorship relation has source
authorshipRelationHasSource.description: Connects an Authorship Relation to one of the Records involved            in the relation.

authorshipRelationHasTarget.label: authorship relation has target
authorshipRelationHasTarget.description: Connects an Authorship Relation to one of the author Person,            Group or Position.

birthDate.label: birth date
birthDate.description: Date at which a Person was born.

calendar.label: calendar
calendar.description: Used system of reckoning time in which the beginning, length,            and divisions of a year are defined, sometimes along with multiyear            cycles.

carrierExtent.label: carrier extent
carrierExtent.description: Number of physical units and/or physical dimensions of the            carrier of a record resource instantiation. Various carriers, depending on specific            needs, may have more than one relevant dimension. In some cases, indicating the number            of physical units may be sufficient, while in other case, relevant dimensions should be            used in order to characterize the carrier.

certainty.label: certainty
certainty.description: Qualifies the level of certitude of the accuracy of a Date, an            Event or a Relation.

childRelationHasSource.label: child relation has source
childRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Child Relation to a parent Person

childRelationHasTarget.label: child relation has target
childRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Child Relation to a child Person

classification.label: classification
classification.description: A term, number or alphanumeric string that is usually taken from            an external classification vocabulary or scheme that qualifies the Record            Resource.

closeTo.label: close to
closeTo.description: An annotation property for recording a possible mapping to a            component in another model or ontology

conditionsOfAccess.label: conditions of access
conditionsOfAccess.description: Terms and circumstances affecting the availability of a Record            Resource for consultation. Such conditions may originate in laws, regulations and            policies, including those pertaining to privacy and security concerns or restrictions;            they may concern a specific Instantiation of a Record Resource, for example, conditions            that require preservation treatment; or they may specify the software or hardware            necessary to access the Instantiation.

conditionsOfUse.label: conditions of use
conditionsOfUse.description: Terms and circumstances affecting the use of a Record Resource            after access has been provided. Includes conditions governing reproduction of the Record            Resource under applicable copyright (intellectual property) and/or property legislation,            and of the Instantiation, due to conservation status.

containsOrContained.label: contains or contained
containsOrContained.description: Connects a Place to a region that is or was within            it.

correspondenceRelationConnects.label: correspondence relation connects
correspondenceRelationConnects.description: Connects a Correspondence Relation to one of the Persons            involved

creationDate.label: creation date
creationDate.description: Date at which an entity was created.

creationRelationHasSource.label: creation relation has source
creationRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Creation Relation to one of the created Record            Resources or Instantiations

creationRelationHasTarget.label: creation relation has target
creationRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Creation Relation to one of the creator            Agents

creationWithRole.label: creation with role
creationWithRole.description: Connects a Creation Relation to the Role Type that the creator            Agent(s) has in the creation process

date.label: date
date.description: Chronological information associated with an entity that            contributes to its identification and contextualization.

dateQualifier.label: date qualifier
dateQualifier.description: Indicates the precision of a date. It specifies if, and to what            extent, the value is an estimation.

dateStandard.label: date standard
dateStandard.description: Identifier of the standard of the Normalized            date.

deathDate.label: death date
deathDate.description: Date at which a Person died.

deletionDate.label: deletion date
deletionDate.description: Date at which an entity was deleted.

derivationRelationHasSource.label: derivation relation has source
derivationRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Derivation Relation to the Instantiation from which            one or more Instantiations is derived.

derivationRelationHasTarget.label: derivation relation has target
derivationRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Derivation Relation to one of the derived            Instantiations

descendanceRelationHasSource.label: descendance relation has source
descendanceRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Descendance Relation to one of the ancestor            Persons

descendanceRelationHasTarget.label: descendance relation has target
descendanceRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Descendance Relation to one of the descendant            Persons

describesOrDescribed.label: describes or described
describesOrDescribed.description: Connects a Record Resource to a Thing that it            describes.

descriptiveNote.label: descriptive note
descriptiveNote.description: Descriptive information about an entity that is not otherwise            addressed.

documents.label: documents
documents.description: Connects a Record Resource or an Instantiation to the Activity            that generates the Record Resource or Instantiation.

eventIsSourceOfEventRelation.label: event is source of event relation
eventIsSourceOfEventRelation.description: Connects an Event to an Event Relation

eventRelationHasSource.label: event relation has source
eventRelationHasSource.description: Connects an Event Relation to an Event

eventRelationHasTarget.label: event relation has target
eventRelationHasTarget.description: Connects an Event Relation to an associated Thing

existsOrExistedIn.label: exists or existed in
existsOrExistedIn.description: Connects a Position to a Group in which that Position exists or            existed, or that is defined by that Groups organizational structure.

expressedDate.label: expressed date
expressedDate.description: Natural language expression of a Date.

expressesOrExpressed.label: expresses or expressed

isOrWasLeaderOf.description: Connects a Person to the Group that Person leads or led in the            past.

isOrWasLegalStatusOf.label: is or was legal status of
isOrWasLegalStatusOf.description: Connects a Legal Status to an Agent or Record Resource that it            categorizes.

isOrWasLegalStatusOfAllMembersOf.label: is or was legal status of all members of
isOrWasLegalStatusOfAllMembersOf.description: Connects a Legal Status and a Record Set whose all past or            present Record or Record Part members have that Legal Status.

isOrWasLegalStatusOfSomeMembersOf.label: is or was legal status of some members of
isOrWasLegalStatusOfSomeMembersOf.description: Connects a Legal Status and a Record Set whose some past or            present Record or Record Part members have that Legal Status.

isOrWasLocationOf.label: is or was location of
isOrWasLocationOf.description: Connects a Place to a Thing that is or was located in the            Place.

isOrWasMainSubjectOf.label: is or was main subject of
isOrWasMainSubjectOf.description: Inverse of 'has or had main subject' object            property.

isOrWasManagerOf.label: is or was manager of
isOrWasManagerOf.description: Connects an Agent to a Record Resource or Instantiation that the            Agent managed or manages.

isOrWasMemberOf.label: is or was member of
isOrWasMemberOf.description: Inverse of 'has or had member' object property.

isOrWasNameOf.label: is or was name of
isOrWasNameOf.description: Connects a Name to a Thing that it designated or            designates.

isOrWasOccupationTypeOf.label: is or was occupation type of
isOrWasOccupationTypeOf.description: Connects an Occupation Type to a Person whose occupation is or            was categorized by it.

isOrWasOccupiedBy.label: is or was occupied by
isOrWasOccupiedBy.description: Inverse of 'occupies or occupied' object            property.

isOrWasOwnerOf.label: is or was owner of
isOrWasOwnerOf.description: Connects a Group, Person or Position to a Thing that this Agent            owns or owned.

isOrWasPartOf.label: is or was part of
isOrWasPartOf.description: Inverse of 'has or had part' relation.

isOrWasParticipantIn.label: is or was participant in
isOrWasParticipantIn.description: Inverse of 'has or had participant' object            property.

isOrWasPerformedBy.label: is or was performed by
isOrWasPerformedBy.description: Connects an Activity to an Agent that performed or performs the            Activity.

isOrWasPhysicalLocationOf.label: is or was physical location of
isOrWasPhysicalLocationOf.description: Connects a Physical Location to a Place, when it is or was its            location.

isOrWasPlaceNameOf.label: is or was place name of
isOrWasPlaceNameOf.description: Connects a Place Name to a Place that was or is designated by            it.

isOrWasPlaceTypeOf.label: is or was place type of
isOrWasPlaceTypeOf.description: Connects a Place Type to a Place that is or was categorized by            it.

isOrWasRecordStateOfAllMembersOf.label: is or was record state of all members of
isOrWasRecordStateOfAllMembersOf.description: Connects a Record State and a Record Set whose all past or            present Record or Record Part members have that Record State.

isOrWasRecordStateOfSomeMembersOf.label: is or was record state of some members of
isOrWasRecordStateOfSomeMembersOf.description: Connects a Record State and a Record Set whose some past or            present Record or Record Part members have that Record State.

isOrWasRegulatedBy.label: is or was regulated by
isOrWasRegulatedBy.description: Inverse of the 'regulates or regulated' object            property.

isOrWasResponsibleForEnforcing.label: is or was responsible for enforcing
isOrWasResponsibleForEnforcing.description: Inverse of 'is or was enforced by' object            property.

isOrWasRuleTypeOf.label: is or was rule type of
isOrWasRuleTypeOf.description: connects a Rule Type to a Rule that it categorized or            categorizes.

isOrWasSubdivisionOf.label: is or was subdivision of
isOrWasSubdivisionOf.description: Inverse of 'has or had subdivision' object            property.

isOrWasSubeventOf.label: is or was subevent of
isOrWasSubeventOf.description: Inverse of 'has or had subevent' object property.

isOrWasSubjectOf.label: is or was subject of
isOrWasSubjectOf.description: Inverse of 'has or had subject' object property.

isOrWasSubordinateTo.label: is or was subordinate to
isOrWasSubordinateTo.description: Inverse of 'has or had subordinate' object            property.

isOrWasTitleOf.label: is or was title of
isOrWasTitleOf.description: Connects a Title to a Record Resource, Instantiation or Rule            that it designated or designates.

isOrWasUnderAuthorityOf.label: is or was under authority of
isOrWasUnderAuthorityOf.description: Inverse of 'has or had authority over' object            property.

isOriginalOf.label: is original of
isOriginalOf.description: Connects the original version of a Record to a copy or a later            version.

isPlaceAssociatedWith.label: is place associated with
isPlaceAssociatedWith.description: Connects a Place to a Thing that Place is associated with the            existence and lifecycle of.

isProductionTechniqueTypeOf.label: is production technique type of
isProductionTechniqueTypeOf.description: Connects a Production Technique Type to an Instantiation whose            production technique is categorized by it.

isPublisherOf.label: isPublisherOf
isPublisherOf.description: Connects an Agent to a Record Resource that it            published.

isRecordResourceAssociatedWithRecordReso.label: is record resource associated with record resource
isRecordResourceAssociatedWithRecordReso.description: Connects two Record Resources. This object property is            symmetric.

isRecordSetTypeOf.label: is record set type of
isRecordSetTypeOf.description: Connects a Record Set Type to a Record Set that it            categorizes.

isRecordStateOf.label: is record state of
isRecordStateOf.description: Connects a Record State to a Record or Record Part whose state            it categorizes.

isRelatedTo.label: is related to
isRelatedTo.description: The most generic object property. Connects an Thing to any other            Thing This is a symmetric object property.

isRepresentationTypeOf.label: is representation type of
isRepresentationTypeOf.description: Connects a Representation Type to an Instantiation that it            categorizes.

isRuleAssociatedWith.label: is rule associated with
isRuleAssociatedWith.description: Connects a Rule to a Thing that is associated with the existence            and lifecycle of the Rule.

isSourceOf.label: is source of
isSourceOf.description: Connects a Record Resource or an Agent to a Record Resource or            Relation, when the first is used as a source of information for identifying or            describing the second one.

isToUseDateOf.label: is to use date of
isToUseDateOf.description: Connects a Date to an Appellation, when it is the date till            which the Appellation was used.

isUnitOfMeasurementOf.label: is unit of measurement of
isUnitOfMeasurementOf.description: Inverse of 'has unit of measurement' object property

issuedBy.label: issued by
issuedBy.description: Connects a Rule to the Agent that issued or published the            Rule.

knowingOfRelationHasSource.label: knowing of relation has source
knowingOfRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Knowing Of Relation to a 'knowing of' Person (a            Person who has some knowledge of another one.)

knowingOfRelationHasTarget.label: knowing of relation has target
knowingOfRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Knowing Of Relation to a 'known by' Person (a Person            on which another one has some has some knowledge.)

knowingRelationConnects.label: knowing relation connects
knowingRelationConnects.description: Connects Knowing Relation to any known Person            involved.

knows.label: knows
knows.description: Connects two Persons that directly know each other during their            existence. This object property is symmetric.

knowsOf.label: knows of
knowsOf.description: Connects a Person to another Person they have some knowledge of            through time or space.

lastModificationDate.label: last modification date
lastModificationDate.description: Date at which an entity was last updated.

latitude.label: latitude
latitude.description: Distance in degrees north or south of the            equator.

leadershipRelationHasSource.label: leadership relation has source
leadershipRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Leadership Relation to a Person who is involved as a            leader.

leadershipRelationHasTarget.label: leadership relation has target
leadershipRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Leadership Relation to a lead Group.

leadershipWithPosition.label: leadership with position
leadershipWithPosition.description: Connects a Leadership Relation to the Position occupied by the            leading Person.

location.label: location
location.description: A delimitation of the physical territory of a place. This            datatype property is used to describe basic human-readable text such as an address, a            cadastral reference, or less precise information found in a record.

longitude.label: longitude
longitude.description: Distance in degrees east or west of a prime            meridian.

managementRelationHasSource.label: management relation has source
managementRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Management Relation to an Agent who is involved as a            manager.

managementRelationHasTarget.label: management relation has target
managementRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Management Relation to a Record Resource or            Instantiation that is involved as a managed thing.

mandateIsSourceOfMandateRelation.label: mandate is source of mandate relation
mandateIsSourceOfMandateRelation.description: Connects a Mandate to a Mandate Relation.

mandateRelationHasSource.label: mandate relation has source
mandateRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Mandate Relation to a Mandate.

mandateRelationHasTarget.label: mandate relation has target
mandateRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Mandate Relation to an Agent who is given the            authority or competencies to act.

measure.label: measure
measure.description: The extent, quantity, amount, or degree of an entity, as            determined by measurement or calculation.

membershipRelationHasSource.label: membership relation has source
membershipRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Membership Relation to the Group that has            member(s).

membershipRelationHasTarget.label: membership relation has target
membershipRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Membership Relation to a Person who is involved as a            member.

membershipWithPosition.label: membership with position
membershipWithPosition.description: Connects a Membership Relation to the Position occupied by the            member Person(s).

migratedInto.label: migrated into
migratedInto.description: Connects an Instantiation to a version it has been migrated            to.

migrationRelationHasSource.label: migration relation has source
migrationRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Migration Relation to the migrated            Instantiation.

migrationRelationHasTarget.label: migration relation has target
migrationRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Migration Relation to a resulting            Instantiation.

modificationDate.label: modification date
modificationDate.description: Date of the modification of an entity.

name.label: name
name.description: A label, title or term designating the entity in order to make            it distinguishable from other similar entities. For Record Resource or Instantiation,            the Name is generally assigned by an Agent as most do not have a Name given when            created.

normalizedDateValue.label: normalized date value
normalizedDateValue.description: Date representation based on a standard, preferably            machine-readable.

normalizedValue.label: normalized value
normalizedValue.description: Value representation based on a standard, preferably            machine-readable.

occupiesOrOccupied.label: occupies or occupied
occupiesOrOccupied.description: Connects a Person to a Position they occupy or            occupied.

overlapsOrOverlapped.label: overlaps or overlapped
overlapsOrOverlapped.description: Connects two Places that geographically overlap or overlapped.            This object property is symmetric.

ownershipRelationHasSource.label: ownership relation has source
ownershipRelationHasSource.description: Connects an Ownership Relation to a Person, Group or Position            that is involved as an owner.

ownershipRelationHasTarget.label: owner ship relation has target
ownershipRelationHasTarget.description: Connects an Ownership Relation to a Thing that is            owned.

performanceRelationHasSource.label: performance relation has source
performanceRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Performance Relation to a performed            Activity.

performanceRelationHasTarget.label: performance relation has target
performanceRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Performance Relation to a performing            Agent.

performsOrPerformed.label: performs or performed
performsOrPerformed.description: Inverse of 'is or was performed by' object            property.

personHasCorrespondenceRelation.label: person has correspondence relation
personHasCorrespondenceRelation.description: Connects a Person to a Correspondence Relation.

personHasFamilyRelation.label: person has family relation
personHasFamilyRelation.description: Connects a Person to a Family Relation.

personHasKnowingRelation.label: person has knowing relation
personHasKnowingRelation.description: Connects a Person to a Knowing Relation.

personHasSiblingRelation.label: person has sibling relation
personHasSiblingRelation.description: Connects a Person to a Sibling Relation.

personHasSpouseRelation.label: person has spouse relation
personHasSpouseRelation.description: Connects a Person to a Spouse Relation.

personIsSourceOfChildRelation.label: person is source of child relation
personIsSourceOfChildRelation.description: Connects a Person (as a parent) to a Child            Relation.

personIsSourceOfDescendanceRelation.label: person is source of descendance relation
personIsSourceOfDescendanceRelation.description: Connects a Person (as an ancestor) to a Descendance            Relation.

personIsSourceOfKnowingOfRelation.label: person is source of knowing of relation
personIsSourceOfKnowingOfRelation.description: Connects a Person (who has some knowledge of another one) to a            Knowing Of Relation.

personIsSourceOfLeadershipRelation.label: person is source of leadership relation
personIsSourceOfLeadershipRelation.description: Connects a Person (as a leader) to a Leadership            Relation.

personIsSourceOfPositionHoldingRelation.label: person is source of position holding relation
personIsSourceOfPositionHoldingRelation.description: Connects a Person (who occupies a Position) to a Position            Holding Relation.

personIsSourceOfTeachingRelation.label: person is source of teaching relation
personIsSourceOfTeachingRelation.description: Connects a Person (as a teacher) to a Teaching            Relation.

personIsTargetOfChildRelation.label: person is target of child relation
personIsTargetOfChildRelation.description: Connects a Person (as a child) to a Child            Relation.

personIsTargetOfDescendanceRelation.label: person is target of descendance relation
personIsTargetOfDescendanceRelation.description: Connects a Person (as a descendant) to a Descendance            Relation.

personIsTargetOfKnowingOfRelation.label: person is target of knowing of relation
personIsTargetOfKnowingOfRelation.description: Connects a Person (of which another Person has some knowledge)            to a Knowing Of Relation.

personIsTargetOfMembershipRelation.label: person is target of membership relation
personIsTargetOfMembershipRelation.description: Connects a Person (as a member of a Group) to a Membership            Relation.

personIsTargetOfTeachingRelation.label: person is target of teaching relation
personIsTargetOfTeachingRelation.description: Connects a Person (as a student) to a Teaching            Relation.

physicalCharacteristics.label: physical characteristics
physicalCharacteristics.description: Information about the physical features of the Instantiation.            Includes information about the physical nature and condition such as conservation            status.

physicalOrLogicalExtent.label: physical or logical extent
physicalOrLogicalExtent.description: Countable characteristics of the content of an entity expressed            as a quantity.

placeIsSourceOfPlaceRelation.label: place is source of place relation
placeIsSourceOfPlaceRelation.description: Connects a Place (as associated to a Thing) to a Place            Relation.

placeRelationHasSource.label: place relation has source
placeRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Place Relation to the Place concerned.

placeRelationHasTarget.label: place relation has target
placeRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Place Relation to a Thing that is associated to the            Place.

positionHoldingRelationHasSource.label: position holding relation has source
positionHoldingRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Position Holding Relation to a Person (who occupies a            Position).

positionHoldingRelationHasTarget.label: position holding relation has target
positionHoldingRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Position Holding Relation to a Position (that is            occupied).

positionIsContextOfLeadershipRelation.label: position is context of leadership relation
positionIsContextOfLeadershipRelation.description: Connects a Position to a Leadership Relation (the leading Person            occupies that Position).

positionIsContextOfMembershipRelation.label: position is context of membership relation
positionIsContextOfMembershipRelation.description: Connects a Position to a Membership Relation (the member Person            occupies that Position).

positionIsSourceOfPositionToGroupRelatio.label: position is source of position to group relation
positionIsSourceOfPositionToGroupRelatio.description: Connects a Position (that exists within a Group) to a Position            to Group Relation.

positionIsTargetOfPositionHoldingRelatio.label: position is target of position holding relation
positionIsTargetOfPositionHoldingRelatio.description: Connects a Position (that is occupied by a Person) to a Position            Holding Relation.

positionToGroupRelationHasSource.label: position to group relation has source
positionToGroupRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Position to Group Relation to a Position (that exists            in a Group).

positionToGroupRelationHasTarget.label: position to group relation has target
positionToGroupRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Position to Group Relation to a Group (in which a            Position exists).

precedesInTime.label: precedes in time
precedesInTime.description: Connects a Thing to a Thing that follows it in chronological            order.

precedesOrPreceded.label: precedes or preceded
precedesOrPreceded.description: Connects a Thing to a Thing that follows or followed it in some            sequence.

productionTechnique.label: production technique
productionTechnique.description: Method used in the representation of information on the            Instantiation.

provenanceRelationHasSource.label: provenance relation has source
provenanceRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Provenance Relation to a Record Resource or            Instantiation.

provenanceRelationHasTarget.label: provenance relation has target
provenanceRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Provenance Relation to an Agent or            Activity.

proxyFor.label: proxy for
proxyFor.description: Connects a Proxy to the Record Resource it stands for in the            specific context of a Record Set.

proxyIn.label: proxy in
proxyIn.description: Connects a Proxy to the Record Set in which it stands for            (represents) another Record Resource.

publicationDate.label: publication date
publicationDate.description: Date of the publication of a Record Resource.

qualityOfRepresentation.label: quality of representation
qualityOfRepresentation.description: Conditions of an Instantiation that impact the legibility or            completeness of Record Resource, and thus the viability of its use. Conditions may be            associated with deficiencies in the processes of Record (re)creation or capture, or the            deterioration of the Instantiation (e.g. its carrier) causing loss of information of the            record over time

recordIsSourceOfAuthorshipRelation.label: record is source of authorship relation
recordIsSourceOfAuthorshipRelation.description: Connects a Record and an Authorship Relation.

recordResourceExtent.label: Record Resource extent
recordResourceExtent.description: The quantity of information content as human experienced            represented in the Record Resource. The method and precision of expressing the quantity            of information represented in a Record Resource will vary by the kind of Record Resource            being described as well as by processing economy constraints. For record sets, quantity            may be expressed as number of records, or, for analogue records in particular, by the            physical storage dimensions of the Record members. For individual records or record            parts, quantity may be expressed in more precise terms. Use if you don't use            RecordResourceExtent class and its properties for handling such            information.

recordResourceGeneticRelationConnects.label: record resource genetic relation connects
recordResourceGeneticRelationConnects.description: Connects a Record Resource Genetic Relation to one of the            associated Record Resources.

recordResourceHoldingRelationHasSource.label: record resource holding relation has source
recordResourceHoldingRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Record Resource Holding Relation to an Agent (as the            holder of a Record Resource or Instantiation).

recordResourceHoldingRelationHasTarget.label: record resource holding relation has target
recordResourceHoldingRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Record Resource Holding Relation to a Record Resource            or Instantiation (that is held by an Agent).

recordResourceIsConnectedToRecordResourc.label: record resource is connected to record resource genetic relation
recordResourceIsConnectedToRecordResourc.description: Connects a Record Resource to a Record Resource Genetic            Relation.

recordResourceIsConnectedToRecordResourc.label: record resource is connected to record resource relation
recordResourceIsConnectedToRecordResourc.description: Connects a Record Resource to a Record Resource            Relation.

recordResourceIsSourceOfRecordResourceTo.label:
record resource is source of record resource to instantiation
            relation
recordResourceIsSourceOfRecordResourceTo.description: Connects a Record Resource (that was instantiated) to a Record            Resource To Instantiation Relation

recordResourceOrInstantiationIsSourceOfA.label:
record resource or instantiation is source of accumulation
            relation
recordResourceOrInstantiationIsSourceOfA.description: Connects a Record Resource or Instantiation (that is            accumulated) to an Accumulation Relation.

recordResourceOrInstantiationIsSourceOfA.label:
record resource or instantiation is source of activity
            documentation relation
recordResourceOrInstantiationIsSourceOfA.description: Connects a Record Resource or Instantiation (that documents an            Activity) to an Activity Documentation Relation.

recordResourceOrInstantiationIsSourceOfA.label:
record resource or instantiation is source of agent origination
            relation
recordResourceOrInstantiationIsSourceOfA.description: Connects a Record Resource or Instantiation (that is created,            sent or accumulated) to an Agent Origination Relation.

recordResourceOrInstantiationIsSourceOfC.label: record resource or instantiation is source of creation relation
recordResourceOrInstantiationIsSourceOfC.description: Connects a Record Resource or Instantiation (that is created) to            a Creation Relation.

recordResourceOrInstantiationIsSourceOfP.label: record resource or instantiation is source of provenance relation
recordResourceOrInstantiationIsSourceOfP.description: Connects a Record Resource or Instantiation (that is created or            accumulated by an Agent, or documents an Activity) to a Provenance            Relation.

recordResourceOrInstantiationIsTargetOfI.label:
record resource or instantiation is target of intellectual
            property rights relation
recordResourceOrInstantiationIsTargetOfI.description: Connects a Record Resource or Instantiation (on which some            intellectual property rights are held) to an Intellectual Property Rights            Relation.

recordResourceOrInstantiationIsTargetOfM.label: record resource or instantiation is target of management relation
recordResourceOrInstantiationIsTargetOfM.description: Connects a Record Resource or Instantiation (that is managed by            an Agent) to a Management Relation.

recordResourceOrInstantiationIsTargetOfR.label:
record resource or instantiation is target of record resource
            holding relation
recordResourceOrInstantiationIsTargetOfR.description: Connects a Record Resource or Instantiation (that is held by an            Agent) to a Record Resource Holding Relation.

recordResourceRelationConnects.label: record resource relation connects
recordResourceRelationConnects.description: Connects a Record Resource relation to one of the related Record            Resources.

recordResourceStructure.label: Record Resource structure
recordResourceStructure.description: Information about the intellectual arrangement and composition            of a Record Resource. For Record and Record Part, it encompasses information about the            intellectual composition of the record, the presence of record parts and their            functions. For Record Set, it encompasses information about the methodology or criteria            used for arranging the Record Set members or Record members within the containing Record            Set

recordResourceToInstantiationRelationHas.label: record resource to instantiation relation has source
recordResourceToInstantiationRelationHas.description: Connects a Record Resource To Instantiation Relation to the            Record Resource (that was instantiated).

recordResourceToInstantiationRelationHas.label: record resource to instantiation relation has target
recordResourceToInstantiationRelationHas.description: Connects a Record Resource To Instantiation Relation to an            Instantiation of the involved Record Resource.

referenceSystem.label: reference system
referenceSystem.description: Framework or standard used to represent an            information.

regulatesOrRegulated.label: regulates or regulated
regulatesOrRegulated.description: Connects a Rule to a Thing that it regulates or            regulated.

relationConnects.label: relation connects
relationConnects.description: Connects an n-ary Relation to any of the Things            involved.

relationHasContext.label: relation has context
relationHasContext.description: Connects an n-ary Relation to a Thing that is a secondary,            contextual entity during the existence of the Relation.

relationHasSource.label: relation has source
relationHasSource.description: Connects an n-ary Relation to a Thing that is its            source.

relationHasTarget.label: relation has target
relationHasTarget.description: Connects an n-ary Relation to a Thing that is its            target.

relationState.label: Relation state
relationState.description: Used to qualify the state of a Relation (e. g. present, past,            ongoing, unknown).

resultsOrResultedFrom.label: results or resulted from
resultsOrResultedFrom.description: Inverse of 'results or resulted in' object            property.

resultsOrResultedIn.label: results or resulted in
resultsOrResultedIn.description: Connects an Event to a Thing that results or resulted from the            Event.

roleIsContextOfCreationRelation.label: role is context of creation relation
roleIsContextOfCreationRelation.description: Connects a Role Type to a Creation Relation (this Role Type            being the specific role played by the creating Person in the context of this            Relation).

ruleFollowed.label: rule followed
ruleFollowed.description: The rule or conditions that govern the existence or lifecycle of            a Thing.

ruleIsSourceOfRuleRelation.label: rule is source of rule relation
ruleIsSourceOfRuleRelation.description: Connects a Rule to a Rule Relation.

ruleRelationHasSource.label: rule relation has source
ruleRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Rule Relation to a Rule.

ruleRelationHasTarget.label: rule relation has target
ruleRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Rule Relation to a Thing (that is associated to a            Rule).

scopeAndContent.label: scope and content
scopeAndContent.description: Summary of the scope (such as time periods, geography) and            content (such as subject matter, administrative processes) of the Record Resource. It            should highlight the information conveyed in the Record Resource, why it was created,            received, and/or maintained, and the Agents connected to it. Scope and Content provides            a more complete summary of the informational content of the Record Resource. It may            include description of relations with agents, activities, dates and places, or with            other record resources. It is not to be confused with the History attribute which            focuses on the origination and subsequence changes to a Record Resource.

sequentialRelationHasSource.label: sequential relation has source
sequentialRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Sequential Relation to a Thing that precedes other            Thing(s) in the sequence.

sequentialRelationHasTarget.label: sequential relation has target
sequentialRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Sequential Relation to a Thing that follows other            Thing(s) in the sequence.

siblingRelationConnects.label: sibling relation connects
siblingRelationConnects.description: Connects a Sibling Relation to one of the siblings            involved.

source.label: source
source.description: Information about a source used to identify or describe an            entity.

spouseRelationConnects.label: spouse relation connects
spouseRelationConnects.description: Connects a Sibling Relation to one of the spouses            involved.

structure.label: structure
structure.description: Information about the intellectual arrangement and composition            of a Record Resource or the physical arrangement and composition of an Instantiation.            For Record and Record Part, it encompasses information about the intellectual            composition of the record, the presence of record parts and their functions. For Record            Set, it encompasses information about the methodology or criteria used for arranging the            Record Set members or Record members within the containing Record Set. For            Instantiation, it may comprise information about the composition of the physical            elements of the instantiation

teachingRelationHasSource.label: teaching relation has source
teachingRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Teaching Relation to a Person (who is a            teacher).

teachingRelationHasTarget.label: teaching relation has target
teachingRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Teaching Relation to a Person (who is a            student).

technicalCharacteristics.label: technical characteristics
technicalCharacteristics.description: Describes any relevant physical or software feature of any            device involved in the creation or management of a Record Resource.

temporalRelationHasSource.label: temporal relation has source
temporalRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Temporal Relation to a Thing that precedes other            Thing(s) in time.

temporalRelationHasTarget.label: temporal relation has target
temporalRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Temporal Relation to a Thing that follows other            Thing(s) in time.

textualValue.label: textual value
textualValue.description: A textual expression of an Appellation or Date.

thingIsConnectedToRelation.label: thing is connected to relation
thingIsConnectedToRelation.description: Connects a Thing to a n-ary Relation.

thingIsContextOfRelation.label: thing is context of relation
thingIsContextOfRelation.description: Connects a Thing (that is a secondary, contextual entity during            the existence of the Relation) to a n-ary Relation.

thingIsSourceOfRelation.label: thing is source of relation
thingIsSourceOfRelation.description: Connects a Thing (that is the source of a Relation) to a            Relation.

thingIsSourceOfSequentialRelation.label: thing is source of sequential relation
thingIsSourceOfSequentialRelation.description: Connects a Thing to a Sequential Relation, when this Thing            precedes other Thing(s) in the sequence.

thingIsSourceOfTemporalRelation.label: thing is source of temporal relation
thingIsSourceOfTemporalRelation.description: Connects a Thing to a Temporal Relation, when this Thing            precedes other Thing(s) in time.

thingIsSourceOfWholePartRelation.label: thing is source of whole part relation
thingIsSourceOfWholePartRelation.description: Connects a Thing to a Whole Part Relation, when this Thing has            Part other Thing(s).

thingIsTargetOfAppellationRelation.label: thing is target of appellation relation
thingIsTargetOfAppellationRelation.description: Connects a Thing (that is designated by an Appellation) to an            Appellation Relation.

thingIsTargetOfAuthorityRelation.label: thing is target of authority relation
thingIsTargetOfAuthorityRelation.description: Connects a Thing (that is under authority of an Agent) to an            Authority Relation.

thingIsTargetOfEventRelation.label: thing is target of event relation
thingIsTargetOfEventRelation.description: Connects a Thing (that is associated with an Event) to an Event            Relation.

thingIsTargetOfOwnershipRelation.label: thing is target of ownership relation
thingIsTargetOfOwnershipRelation.description: Connects a Thing (that is owned by a Group, a Person or a            Position) to an Ownership Relation.

thingIsTargetOfPlaceRelation.label: thing is target of place relation
thingIsTargetOfPlaceRelation.description: Connects a Thing (that is associated with a Place) to a Place            Relation.

thingIsTargetOfRelation.label: thing is target of relation
thingIsTargetOfRelation.description: Connects a Thing to a n-ary Relation.

thingIsTargetOfRuleRelation.label: thing is target of rule relation
thingIsTargetOfRuleRelation.description: Connects a Thing (that is associated with a Rule) to a Rule            Relation.

thingIsTargetOfSequentialRelation.label: thing is target of sequential relation
thingIsTargetOfSequentialRelation.description: Connects a Thing (that follows other Thing(s) in a sequence) to            a Sequential Relation.

thingIsTargetOfTemporalRelation.label: thing is target of temporal relation
thingIsTargetOfTemporalRelation.description: Connects a Thing (that follows other Thing(s) in time) to a            Temporal Relation.

thingIsTargetOfTypeRelation.label: thing is target of type relation
thingIsTargetOfTypeRelation.description: Connects a Thing (that is categorized by a Type) to a Type            Relation.

thingIsTargetOfWholePartRelation.label: thing is target of whole part relation
thingIsTargetOfWholePartRelation.description: Connects a Thing to a Whole Part Relation, when this Thing is            Part of another Thing.

title.label: title
title.description: An identifying name of a Record Resource, Instantiation or            Rule.

type.label: type
type.description: A term used to characterize an entity.

typeIsSourceOfTypeRelation.label: type is source of type relation
typeIsSourceOfTypeRelation.description: Connects a Type (a category) to a Type Relation.

typeRelationHasSource.label: type relation has source
typeRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Type Relation to the Type (that categorizes the            involved Thing(s)).

typeRelationHasTarget.label: type relation has target
typeRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Type Relation to a Thing (that is categorized by the            involved Type).

unitOfMeasurement.label: unit of measurement
unitOfMeasurement.description: A definite magnitude of a quantity, defined and adopted by convention or by            law, that is used as a standard for measurement of the same kind of quantity. Can be            spacial units (cm, m), weight (g, kg), time (s, h), storage (MB, TB) or more informal            units used in the archival context like number of boxes, pages or words.

usedFromDate.label: used from date
usedFromDate.description: Date at which an Appellation was first used.

usedToDate.label: used to date
usedToDate.description: Date until an Appellation was used.

wasLastUpdatedAtDate.label: was last updated at date
wasLastUpdatedAtDate.description: Connects a Thing to the Date when it was last            modified.

wasUsedFromDate.label: was used from date
wasUsedFromDate.description: Connects an Appellation to the Date from which it was            used.

wasUsedToDate.label: was used to date
wasUsedToDate.description: Connects an Appellation to the Date till when it was            used.

wholePartRelationHasSource.label: whole part relation has source
wholePartRelationHasSource.description: Connects a Whole Part Relation to the Thing that has some            parts.

wholePartRelationHasTarget.label: whole part relation has target
wholePartRelationHasTarget.description: Connects a Whole Part Relation to a Thing that is a            part.

workRelationConnects.label: work relation connects
workRelationConnects.description: Connects a Work Relation to an Agent.
